about.title: About the Group
about.intro: We are a restaurant group born in Seville to showcase a vibrant, creative and sustainable Andalusia.

story.heading: Our story
story.body: We began in 2014 with a small space devoted to contemporary tapas. Today we manage seven culinary concepts with the same foundation: local produce, respect for tradition and genuine service.
story.body2: We work with Andalusian producers, incorporate modern techniques and maintain a firm commitment to sustainability and community.
